short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates a random password, copies it to the clipboard & automatically fills form password fields.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instant Password Generator creates a new password the instant you open it, copies it to the clipboard and will automatically fill available password fields on your active tab.

Simple and fast, super lightweight, minimal permissions required - no exposure of your data, browser history or any of that stuff required!

Customise the password length and which characters to use and quickly create random passwords on registration pages.
